entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as a person who agrees with the speaker. ("Agreed," said Fred.)

entities.name: people
entities.description: People are referred to as a group, urging them to calm down. ("So, people, let’s try and calm down a bit.")

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is mentioned as a character who can kill people with a single glance from his eyes. ("That’s a basilisk, listeners. One simple test: Check whether the thing that’s glaring at you has got legs.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is laughing for the first time in weeks. ("For the ﬁrst time in weeks and weeks, Harry was laughing:")

entities.name: basilisk
entities.description: A basilisk is mentioned as a creature that can kill people with a single glance from its eyes. ("That’s a basilisk, listeners.")

relationships.description: Fred is addressing people to calm down. ("So, people, let’s try and calm down a bit.")
You-Know-Who is equated with a basilisk, which can kill people with a single glance from its eyes. ("That’s a basilisk, listeners.")
You-Know-Who can harm people with a single glance from his eyes. ("That’s a basilisk, listeners.")
Harry is laughing at the situation involving people. ("For the ﬁrst time in weeks and weeks, Harry was laughing:")
